Shops.Name: Arcade of Sighs
Shops.Description: Here the solemn bandaged merchants of the colonies trade old cold coins for brighter things.

Shops.Name: Hollow Temple
Shops.Description: The image of a long-snouted reptile god still stands in the temple, but now storytellers gather here.

Shops.Name: The Charnel Lounge
Shops.Description: Do you have tomb-colonists? Drop them off here for payment.
